hindi:
करता था सो क्यों किया, अब कर क्यों पछिताय।
बोया पेड़ बबूल का, आम कहाँ से खाय।
english:
Karta tha so kyon kiya, ab kar kyon pachitay.
Boya ped babool ka, aam kahaa se khay.
translation: Why did you do what you did, why are you regretting it now? You sowed a plant of thorns, how would it bear mangoes?
